languages.text: Для определения траектории выстрелов в рамках очереди используется {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристика{/g} персонажа {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. Выстрелы в рамках очереди могут быть направлены по прямой, с отклонением или с незначительным отклонением в любую из сторон. В эффективном радиусе оружия траектории с незначительным отклонением совпадают с центральной линией, а выстрелы со стандартным отклонением смещаются на 1 клетку вправо или влево от центральной линии. В максимальном радиусе незначительное отклонение означает смещение на 1 клетку от центральной линии, а стандартное отклонение – смещение на 2 клетки. Базовый шанс направить выстрелы по центральной линии или с незначительным отклонением равен (40 + Дальний Бой / 2)% — этот показатель не может быть ниже 30% и выше 95%. Эти выстрелы с равной вероятностью распределяются между центральной линией и незначительным отклонением. Остальные выстрелы выполняются со стандартным отклонением. Если выстрел попадает в цель за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} на любой из траекторий, цель может воспользоваться шансом избежать атаки. Частичное укрытие дает шанс избежать атаки, равный 35%, а полное увеличивает его до 60%. Этот шанс может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} персонажа, а также положительных или {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g}. Если воспользоваться укрытием не удалось, цель попробует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, дающих {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не смогла воспользоваться укрытием и уклониться от одиночного выстрела. Для выстрелов по центральной линии действует правило: каждый 1% шанса попадания выше 95% трансформируется в 1% шанса совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}. При этом шанс критического попадания рассчитывается отдельно для каждого выстрела. Для всех выстрелов очереди действуют правила {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}сквозного пробития{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивания{/g}.
languages.original_text: To determine the trajectory of shots in a ranged burst attack, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. The shots in a burst can follow the central line or move with a slight or a strong deviation to either side. Within the effective range of a weapon, slight deviation trajectories overlap the central line, while shots made with a strong deviation are directed toward targets in 1 cell to either side of the central line. Within the maximum range of a weapon, slight deviation shots are directed toward targets in 1 cell to either side of the central line, and the strong deviation shots hit targets in 2 cells to either side of the central line. The base chance to direct shots along the central line or with a slight deviation is (40 + Ballistic Skill / 2)% — this value cannot be lower than 30% nor higher than 95%. This chance is split equally between shooting along the central line and with a slight deviation. Otherwise, the shot has a strong deviation. If the shot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} on any of the trajectories, characters can try to avoid the attack. Partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack and full cover increases it to 60%. This chance may vary depending on the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, as well as any positive or {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If cover fails, the target will attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to take cover or dodge the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack. When shooting along the central trajectory, for every additional 1% hit chance above 95%, the chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} increases by +1%. Critical hit chance is calculated separately for each shot. Each shot in a burst is subject to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g}.

Die Schüsse einer Salve können einer zentralen Linie folgen oder eine leichte seitliche Abweichung haben. languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} d'un personnage permet de déterminer la trajectoire des tirs lors d'une attaque en rafale à distance. languages.original_text: To determine the trajectory of shots in a ranged burst attack, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. Partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack and full cover increases it to 60%. This chance may vary depending on the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, as well as any positive or {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If cover fails, the target will attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to take cover or dodge the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack. Critical hit chance is calculated separately for each shot. Each shot in a burst is subject to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g}.

languages.text: Para determinar la trayectoria de los disparos en un ataque de ráfaga a distancia se utiliza la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del personaje. Los disparos de una ráfaga pueden seguir la línea central o desviarse ligera o intensamente hacia uno de los lados. En el alcance efectivo del arma, las trayectorias con desvío ligero se solapan con la línea central, mientras que los disparos con desvío intenso se dirigen contra objetivos a 1 casilla de la línea central. En el alcance máximo del arma, las trayectorias con desvío ligero se dirigen contra objetivos a 1 casilla de la línea central y los disparos con desvío intenso golpean a objetivos a 2 casillas de la línea central. La probabilidad base de dirigir los disparos por la línea central o con desvío ligero es del (40 + Habilidad de proyectiles / 2) %, y este valor no puede ser inferior al 30 % ni superior al 95 %. Esta probabilidad se divide equitativamente entre disparar en la línea central y con desvío ligero. Cualquier otro disparo sufre un desvío intenso. Si el disparo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un objetivo que esté a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g} en cualquiera de las trayectorias, el personaje puede intentar evitar el ataque. La cobertura parcial proporciona una probabilidad del 35 % de evitar el ataque, y la completa, un 60 %. Esta probabilidad puede variar en función de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del personaje y de sus {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} o positivos. Si la cobertura no protege al objetivo, intentará {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque. La probabilidad de esquiva base es (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del atacante) %. Esta probabilidad también puede verse modificada por capacidades y efectos que apliquen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} o penalizaciones a la esquiva del objetivo o a la reducción de esquiva del atacante. El objetivo recibirá {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} si no consigue ponerse a cubierto ni esquivar el ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g}. Al disparar en la trayectoria central, cada 1 % de probabilidad de impacto que supere el 95 % aumenta la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} en +1 %. La probabilidad de impacto crítico se calcula por separado para cada disparo. Cada disparo de la ráfaga está sujeto a las reglas de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuje{/g}.

languages.text: To determine the trajectory of shots, a character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is used. There are 5 possible trajectories to fire, separated into 3 categories -- central line, slight deviation and strong deviation. In effective distance of a weapon slight deviation and central line are overlapping and are essentially the same trajectory, while strong deviation is 1 cell for either side of the central line. After that slight deviation shots will go 1 cell to either side of central line, while strong deviation will go 2 cells. The base chance to direct shots along the central line or slight deviation is (40 + Ballistic Skill/2)% — this value cannot be lower than 30% nor higher than 95%. This chance is split equaly between going on a central line and going on slight deviation. If the shot didn't go towards central line or slight deviation it goes into strong deviation. If the shot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} on any of the trajectories, characters can try to avoid the attack. Partial cover gives a 35% chance to avoid an attack and full cover increases it to 60%. This chance may vary depending on the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, as well as any positive or {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. If cover fails, the target will attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by abilities and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. The target will take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they fail to take cover or dodge the {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack. When shooting along the central trajectory, even for bursts, for every additional 1% chance to hit above 95%, the chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} increases by 1%. In the case of burst attacks, critical hit chance is calculated separately for each shot. Each shot from a burst attack is subject to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g}.
